original_title: Former MP Dayasritha Tissera Joins SJB Ranks
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Former United People's Freedom Alliance (UPFA) Member of Parliament, Dayashrita Thisera, has officially joined the Samagi Jana Balawegaya (SJB).
He met with Opposition Leader Sajith Premadasa and pledged his support for the party's programs and joined the SJB Alliance.

Thisera's political pedigree carries significant weight. As the son of renowned politician Protus Thisera, he has held several prominent positions in past governments, including powerful cabinet and deputy minister roles.
Furthermore, Premadasa has entrusted Thisera with the crucial role of electorate organizer for Natthandiya.
